verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: It pays to serve Jesus, it pays ev'ry day, It pays ev'ry step of the way; Tho' the pathway to glory may sometimes be drear, You’ll be happy each step of the way.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Tho' sometimes the shadows may hang o’er the way, And sorrows may come to beckon us home, Our precious Redeemer each toil will repay; It pays to serve Jesus each day.
